categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Raygus Mol was a male Human colonel of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War, infamous for the burning of New Drev'starn. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan and defected from the Empire, joining with the Revanite forces on Rishi's Sky Ridge Island under command of Lord Ivress. However, a fellow Revanite from the Galactic Republic Edrinu Zaya became disillusioned with the new cause after realizing that the Revanites accepted the Empire's worst butchers. She asked a Republic agent infiltrating their camp to kill Imperial colonel Mol, a mission that was successfully accomplished.
Colonel Raygus Mol appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
